attributes.action: To bring the perpetrators of all the grooming gang cases to justice.
attributes.additional_details: I believe the government and involved councils have not listened to what is a huge majority of British citizens, by failing to seek justice in any degree.
attributes.background: We want a full national enquiry into proven and suspected cases, and for both the perpetrators and those responsible for the cover ups ..ongoing and historical, to be brought to justice and punished to the fullest extent of the law.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
